data.title: Animals In The Cage
data.statement:
There are 2 types of animals in a cage.
An animal of the first type has <<one head and [[c1]] feet>>.
An animal of the second type has <<one head and [[c2]] feet>>.
A cloth covers the middle of the cage so you can only see <<how many heads>> in total are in the cage and <<how many feet>> in total are in the cage.
You need to find out how many animals of <<each type>> are in the cage.
data.constraints:
0 < [[c1]],[[c2]] < 50
0 < [[heads]],[[feet]] < 1e9
[[name1]],[[name2]] only contain lower case letters
0 < length of [[name1]],[[name2]] < 20
[[c1]] != [[c2]]
[[name1]] != [[name2]]
data.stubGenerator:
read heads:int feet:int
read name1:word(20) c1:int
read name2:word(20) c2:int
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> two integers [[heads]] and [[feet]]
<<Line 2:>> a string [[name1]] and an integer [[c1]], representing an animal of type [[name1]] that has [[c1]] feet.
<<Line 3:>> a string [[name2]] and an integer [[c2]], representing an animal of type [[name2]] that has [[c2]] feet.
data.outputDescription:
If it's impossible, output "impossible"
If it's possible, output 2 lines:
<<Line 1:>> the number of animals of the first type type [[x1]] and a string [[name1]]
<<Line 2:>> the number of animals of the second type type [[x2]] and a string [[name2]]
<<Specially, you need to add an {{s}} after the name if there is not one animal of the type>>

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

There are 2 types of animals in a cage.
An animal of the first type has one head and c1 feet.
An animal of the second type has one head and c2 feet.
A cloth covers the middle of the cage so you can only see how many heads in total are in the cage and how many feet in total are in the cage.
You need to find out how many animals of each type are in the cage.
Input
Line 1: two integers heads and feet
Line 2: a string name1 and an integer c1, representing an animal of type name1 that has c1 feet.
Line 3: a string name2 and an integer c2, representing an animal of type name2 that has c2 feet.
Output
If it's impossible, output "impossible"
If it's possible, output 2 lines:
Line 1: the number of animals of the first type type x1 and a string name1
Line 2: the number of animals of the second type type x2 and a string name2
Specially, you need to add an s after the name if there is not one animal of the type
Constraints
0 < c1,c2 < 50
0 < heads,feet < 1e9
name1,name2 only contain lower case letters
0 < length of name1,name2 < 20
c1 != c2
name1 != name2
Example
Input
10 30
chicken 2
rabbit 4
Output
5 chickens
5 rabbits
